cast.name: 里纳尔多·塔拉蒙蒂 Rinaldo Talamonti
海伦娜·罗斯克兰茨 Helena Rosenkranz
克劳斯·芒斯特 Klaus Münster
若阿内斯·巴尔斯基 Johannes Buzalski
狄波拉·罗尔斯 Deborah Ralls

director.name: 恩斯特·霍夫鲍尔 Ernst Hofbauer

this_title: Schulmädchen-Report 7: Doch das Herz muß dabei sein
trans_title: 校园女孩报告：心要投入
introduction: A bunch of lovely teenage schoolgirls work at a secret brothel where they have sex with high paying older men. After the girls all get arrested for prostitution, several of them discuss how they wound up working at said brothel: Helga gets guys to do her homework in exchange for sex, an ice cream parlor waiter promises three gals free ice cream if they all have sex with him, enticing hitchhiker Monika lures men to a remote barn so she can rob them of their money, brainy virgin Karla convinces her father’s business partner to deflower her, an uptight Prussian teacher encounters rowdy Bavarian students in his classroom, and smitten student Gaby pretends to be her mother so she can make love to a teacher she has a crush on.
chinese_title: 校园女孩报告：心要投入
foreign_title: Schulmädchen-Report 7: Doch das Herz muß dabei sein
